Parameters: boolean: true to enable automatic hiding
setAutoHideEnabled(boolean).Description: Sets whether the associated FloatingActionButton automatically hides when there is not enough space to be displayed. This works with @B_android#support#design#widget#AppBarLayout_E@ and @B_android#support#design#widget#BottomSheetBehavior_E@.

isAutoHideEnabled().Description: Returns whether the associated FloatingActionButton automatically hides when there is not enough space to be displayed.

ClassDesc: Behavior designed for use with @B_android#support#design#widget#FloatingActionButton_E@ instances. Its main function is to move @B_android#support#design#widget#FloatingActionButton_E@ views so that any displayed @B_android#support#design#widget#Snackbar_E@s do not cover them.
